mapper.select: SELECT c.`company_name`,c.`company_address`,c.`type_ownership`,c.`main_business`, c.`strategic_focus`,c.`listed_unlisted`, c.`company_ranking`,c.`licence_no`,c.`production`,c.`organization`,c.`expire_date`, c.`business_license`,c.`exequatur` FROM company c, product p, z_product_type d WHERE p.company_id=c.`id`AND c.`id`=p.`company_id` AND p.product_type_id=d.id AND d.id=1 ;
